products.name: Chicken Fries
products.description: Made with white meat chicken, our Chicken Fries are coated in a light crispy breading seasoned with savory spices and herbs. Chicken Fries are shaped like fries and are perfect to dip in any of our delicious dipping sauces. Choose from BBQ, Honey Mustard, Ranch, Zesty, Buffalo and Sweet & Sour.

products.name: Jalapeno Cheddar Bites 4 Piece
products.description: Our Jalapeño Cheddar Bites are filled with gooey cheddar cheese and spicy jalapeño pieces, covered in a light, crispy coating. Served hot and melty with your order.

products.name: Mozzarella Sticks 4 Piece
products.description: Try our delicious Mozzarella cheese sticks. Served with marinara dipping sauce, Mozzarella sticks are always a great snack

products.name: MOTTS Applesauce
products.description: 100% Natural applesauce from all natural ingredients with no added sugar. Contains 1 full serving of fruit, is naturally gluten free, and provides an excellent source of Vitamin C.
A delicious orange juice with a taste that's the next best thing to fresh-squeezed. Try our premium, not-from-concentrate orange juice.
100% real apple juice from concentrate with added ingredients. All natural beverage containing no preservatives.

products.name: Bottled Nestlé Pure Life Purified Water
products.description: Nestlé® Pure Life® Purified Water, the exclusive bottled water of BURGER KING®, is a cool and refreshing way to wash down your signature favorites. © Nestlé Waters North America Inc.

options.name: Bottled Nestlé Pure Life Purified Water

mainItem.name: Bottled Nestlé Pure Life Purified Water

products.name: HERSHEY'S Sundae Pie
products.description: Say hello to our HERSHEY’S® Sundae Pie. One part crunchy chocolate crust and one part chocolate crème filling, garnished with a delicious topping and real HERSHEY’S® Chocolate Chips.The HERSHEY’S® trademark and trade dress are used under license.

products.name: OREO Cookie Shake
products.description: Cool down with our creamy hand spun OREO Cookie Shake. Velvety Vanilla Soft Serve, OREO cookie pieces and vanilla sauce are blended to perfection and finished with a sweet whipped topping just for you. OREO is a registered trademark of Mondelēz International group, used under license.

products.name: Chocolate OREO Cookie Shake
products.description: A spin on our classic OREO Cookie Shake, the OREO Cookie Chocolate Shake is a smooth shake made with velvety vanilla soft serve and blended with OREO Cookie pieces and chocolate sauce. OREO is a registered trademark of Mondelēz International group, used under license.

products.name: Chocolate Shake
products.description: Cool down with our creamy Hand Spun Shake. Velvety vanilla soft serve and your choice of flavor are blended to perfection just for you.

products.name: Vanilla Shake
products.description: Cool down with our creamy Hand Spun Shake. Velvety vanilla soft serve and your choice of flavor are blended to perfection just for you.

products.name: Soft Serve Cup
products.description: We didn't invent soft serve, but with one taste of our cool, creamy, and velvety Vanilla Soft Serve, you'll think we perfected it. Served in a cone.

products.name: Soft Serve Cone
products.description: We didn't invent soft serve, but with one taste of our cool, creamy, and velvety Vanilla Soft Serve, you'll think we perfected it. Served in a cup.
